page.title: 08HOMELIFE
page.content: Normally the men go to work.And the ladies work at home to look after the house.The children go to school.The ladies jobs at home are ironing, washing, cooking and hoovering. Mums pick all the things up that you just leave lying around. Your mum does this to prevent accidents. Lot's of children have pet's. Your mum cooks your food for your meals. We eat many different types of food. Fresh food is best for you but we also have canned and frozen food .Everybody enjoys the occasional fish and chips or a Chinese takeaway meal! We are becoming more aware of our diets and are encouraged to eat more fibre, and less additives such as colouring flavourings and preservatives.
